bike.description: Specialized compact design, lighter S-Works high modulus advanced carbon composite monocoque frame and advanced composite seat stays with Zertz inserts, 1K carbon weave finish

components.description: S-Works Full Carbon Zertz with 1K carbon weave, monocoque high modulus advanced composite legs, high modulus carbon threadless steerer
Specialized Mindset, 1 1/8" integrated threadless, with triple sealed cartridge bearings, carbon cone and headset spacers
Roubaix, forged with Cr-Mo binder bolt
Chain stay cover, reflectors, clear coat, owners manual
